content:
def createValuator(self):
        self._valuator = self.createcomponent(
            'valuator',
            (('dial', 'valuator'),),
            None,
            DialWidget,
            (self.interior(),),
            style = self['style'],
            command = self.setEntry,
            value = self['value'])
        self._valuator._widget.bind('<Double-ButtonPress-1>', self.mouseReset)
